Question: Here **** experimented with marshaling suspense in a confined environment, as he had done earlier with Lifeboat (1943).
Hints: This person also wrote a mystery story for Look magazine in 1943, "The Murder of Monty Woolley".
This person directed more than fifty feature films in a career spanning six decades.
Notwithstanding his technical brilliance as a director, this person relied on his writers a great deal.".
